g_bEnableWIPF18Avionics: F-18C Work In Progress Avionics (disabled by default).
g_bF16MfdHasRwr: Enables the RWR MFD page back for the F16s (unrealistic feature).
g_bOnlinePlayersDisplayDefault: Specifies whether the OnlinePlayersDisplay overlay should be ON(1) or OFF(0) by default when entering 3D.
g_bPilotEntertainment: Enables the user to control WinAmp.
g_bPlayDogfightBits: Enables playback of the various sound comments in the dogfight scores menu.
g_bPrettyScreenShot: If set, "PrtScr" key will make pretty screenshots (no overlays) instead of normal ones (1 = pretty, 0 = normal).
g_bPreventScreensaver: activation of screensaver/powersave mode (1 = prevent, 0 = do not prevent)
g_bhudAOA: Enables the HUD AOA for non-F16 aircraft.
g_bshowframeratedefault: Specifies whether the frame rate overlay should be ON(1) or OFF(0) by default when entering 3D.
g_fMeanTimeBetweenFailures: The MTBF in hours. If set to 0, uses the value in ac.dat.
g_fPadlockBoxTimeout: Number in seconds for how long the box should be displayed over any one padlock subject before it disappears (-1 turns it off).
g_fViewlimitPitchDown: Overrides all A/C "viewlimit pitch down" values from the 3dckpit.dat files, max. 90.0, only higher values take effect.
g_nActionCameraTimer: Sets the duration in ms for the action camera before switching views. (default is 8000, i.e. 8 seconds).
g_nBumpIntensityMinTime: This determines the minimum bump intensity "peak time", i.e how long a value is visible in shared memory (default 100).
g_nJpegCompression: Sets the compression level for JPEG screenshots, 0-100 (default 90).
g_nMessageScrollTime: Time in seconds until a chat message scrolls out of view.
g_nPadlockBoxThickness: Determines the thickness of the padlock box.
